question: 錯乱
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>confused</kanji> <kanji>riot</kanji> causes even more <vocabulary>confusion</vocabulary>. Soon there will be so many <vocabulary>distraction</vocabulary>s happening, what with cars tipping over and fires starting, that no one will know which way is up!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
